tool_description: This API verifies whether a submitted Social Security Number matches a submitted name.
name: SSN-Name Verification
title: SSN-Name Verification

api_list.name: GetReport
api_list.description: Get report associated with SSN and name
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ssn-name-verification.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ssn-name-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ssn-name-verification.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ssn-name-verification.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
